original_title: Complaint lodged against Dayasiri for assaulting SLFP photographer
original_body_lines: A photographer attached to the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) lodged a complaint over an alleged assault by MP Dayasiri Jayasekara.
The victim who complained to the Cinnamon Gardens Police said the attack took place during an event held at the BMICH where former President Maithripala Sirisena and others were present.
